mapper.sql: ( SELECT t2.mall_partner, t2.user_id, t1.recharge_amount * 0.02 AS money, CASE record_type WHEN 1 THEN 1 WHEN 2 THEN 2 WHEN 3 THEN 2 END AS type FROM czb_direct_charging_order t1 LEFT JOIN czb_user t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id WHERE t1.state != 0 AND t1.state != 3 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT t2.mall_partner, t2.user_id, t1.price * 0.01 AS money, CASE record_type WHEN 1 THEN 3 WHEN 2 THEN 4 END AS type FROM czb_h5_stock t1 LEFT JOIN czb_user t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id WHERE t1.state = 2 )
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(fnd.totalMoney) FROM (SELECT t1.user_id userId, t1.user_account userAccount, t1.create_at createAt, t2.totalMoney FROM ( SELECT t1.user_id, t1.user_account, t1.create_at FROM czb_user t1 LEFT JOIN czb_user_role t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_role t3 ON t3.role_id = t2.role_id WHERE t3.role_name = '商城合伙人' ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT fnd.mall_partner, SUM(IFNULL(fnd.money,0)) totalMoney FROM () AS fnd GROUP BY fnd.mall_partner ) t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.mall_partner) AS fnd
SELECT SUM( fnd.money ) AS totalMoney, fnd.type FROM () AS fnd WHERE fnd.mall_partner = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or fnd.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY fnd.type

SELECT COUNT( t2.user_id ) personNumber, t1.user_id userId, t1.user_Account userAccount, t1.create_at createAt FROM czb_user t1 LEFT JOIN czb_user t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.mall_partner LEFT JOIN czb_user_role t3 ON t1.user_id = t3.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_role t4 ON t3.role_id = t4.role_id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.role_name = '商城合伙人'
AND t1.user_account LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userAccount, jdbcType = VARCHAR},'%')
AND (t1.create_at >= #{startTime} AND t1.create_at <= #{endTime})
GROUP BY t1.user_id ORDER BY t1.create_at DESC

SELECT SUM( t1.recharge_amount ) grossSales, SUM( t1.recharge_amount ) * 0.02 totalRevenue, COUNT( t1.user_id ) orderNumber FROM czb_direct_charging_order t1 LEFT JOIN czb_user t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_user t3 ON t2.mall_partner = t3.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_user_role t4 ON t2.mall_partner = t4.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_role t5 ON t4.role_id = t5.role_id WHERE t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.mall_partner IS NOT NULL AND t2.mall_partner != '' AND t5.role_name = '商城合伙人' AND t1.state != 0 AND t1.state != 3
AND t1.record_type = 1
AND (t1.record_type = 2 or t1.record_type = 3)
AND t2.mall_partner = #{userId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT SUM( t1.amount ) grossSales, SUM( t1.amount ) * 0.01 totalRevenue, COUNT( t1.integral_purchase_record_id ) orderNumber FROM czb_integral_purchase_record t1 LEFT JOIN czb_user t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_user t3 ON t2.mall_partner = t3.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_user_role t4 ON t2.mall_partner = t4.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_role t5 ON t4.role_id = t5.role_id WHERE t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.mall_partner IS NOT NULL AND t2.mall_partner != '' AND t5.role_name = '商城合伙人'
AND t2.mall_partner = #{userId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT SUM( t1.price ) grossSales, SUM( t1.price ) * 0.01 totalRevenue, COUNT( t1.stock_id ) orderNumber FROM czb_h5_stock t1 LEFT JOIN czb_user t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_user t3 ON t2.mall_partner = t3.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_user_role t4 ON t2.mall_partner = t4.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_role t5 ON t4.role_id = t5.role_id WHERE t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.mall_partner IS NOT NULL AND t2.mall_partner != '' AND t5.role_name = '商城合伙人' AND t1.state = 2
AND t1.record_type = 1
AND t1.record_type = 2
AND t2.mall_partner = #{userId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT SUM( t1.recharge_amount ) grossSales, SUM( t1.recharge_amount ) * 0.02 totalRevenue, COUNT( t1.user_id ) orderNumber FROM czb_direct_charging_order t1 LEFT JOIN czb_user t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_user_role t3 ON t2.user_id = t3.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_role t4 ON t3.role_id = t4.role_id WHERE t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.role_name = '商城合伙人' AND t1.state != 0 AND t1.state != 3
AND t1.record_type = 1
AND (t1.record_type = 2 or t1.record_type = 3)
AND t1.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT SUM( t1.amount ) grossSales, SUM( t1.amount ) * 0.01 totalRevenue, COUNT( t1.integral_purchase_record_id ) orderNumber FROM czb_integral_purchase_record t1 LEFT JOIN czb_user t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_user_role t3 ON t2.user_id = t3.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_role t4 ON t3.role_id = t4.role_id WHERE t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.role_name = '商城合伙人'
AND t1.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT SUM( t1.price ) grossSales, SUM( t1.price ) * 0.01 totalRevenue, COUNT( t1.stock_id ) orderNumber FROM czb_h5_stock t1 LEFT JOIN czb_user t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_user_role t3 ON t2.user_id = t3.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_role t4 ON t3.role_id = t4.role_id WHERE t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.role_name = '商城合伙人' AND t1.state = 2
AND t1.record_type = 1
AND t1.record_type = 2
AND t1.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT t1.user_id userId, t1.user_account userAccount, t2.recharge_account rechargeAccount, t2.order_id orderId, t2.recharge_amount rechargeAmount, t2.real_price realPrice, t2.create_at createAt FROM czb_user t1 LEFT JOIN czb_direct_charging_order t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id WHERE t1.mall_partner = #{userId, jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND t2.state != 0 AND t2.state != 3
AND t2.record_type = 1
AND (t2.record_type = 2 OR t2.record_type = 3)
AND t1.user_account LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userAccount, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, '%')
AND t2.create_at >= #{startTime} AND t2.create_at <= #{endTime}

SELECT t1.user_id userId, t1.user_account userAccount, t1.user_account rechargeAccount, t2.stock_id orderId, t2.recharge_amount rechargeAmount, t2.price realPrice, t2.create_at createAt FROM czb_user t1 LEFT JOIN czb_h5_stock t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id WHERE t1.mall_partner = #{userId, jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND t2.state = 2
AND t2.record_type = 1
AND t2.record_type = 2
AND t1.user_account like CONCAT('%', #{userAccount, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, '%')
AND t2.create_at >= #{startTime} AND t2.create_at <= #{endTime}

SELECT t1.user_name userName, t1.create_at createAt, SUM(ifnull(fnd.money, 0)) totalRevenue, t1.user_id userId FROM czb_user t1 LEFT JOIN () AS fnd ON t1.user_id = fnd.user_id WHERE t1.mall_partner = #{userId, jdbcType = VARCHAR} GROUP BY t1.user_id
